name: Honey, we're leaking fuel! Desktop Edition
name_original: Honey, we're leaking fuel! Desktop Edition
description:
//README
Hi! I hope you enjoy my game 'Honey, we're leaking fuel!'.
I made it as a tribute to the appstore smashhit 'Flappy Bird' as part of the 'Flappy Jam' competition.
Check out the jam for more awesome tribute games!

Good luck!

Marc

Graphics by @KenneyWings

Want to play in your browser instead? Play the free HTML5 edition.

//CONTROLS
Tap, tap and tap in the sky to ignite your plane's engine and stay in the air.
Watch out for rock formations. Oh, and grab some fuel on the way by tapping on the floating barrels.
